subject: TNT Express Worldwide
body:
TNT Express Worldwide 
NEW YORK
Contact Person:
Larry Wayne Ellis
Director  Parcel Procurement
Department
                    Dear Customer: 
TNT Management hereby wish to congratulate today that your ATM CARD was successfully posted to your new address presented to us last week by Mrs. Lucia Sausa who claimed that you died few weeks ago in Hospital by Corona Virus and presented us a new address below and also paid the Out-standing Euro 370 balance of your fees
    Here is the Delivery Postal address presented to us by your family member Mrs. Lucia Sausa in Roma Italy
  Receivers Name: Mrs.Lucia Sausa
  Address:Via Del Campidogilo 1
  00100 Roma Italia
  Now we want to know if you are aware of this notice, If we did not hear from you today, We will confirm that you are dead and handover the ATM CARD parcel to her by tomorrow.  since we have not heard from you for the past 3 Months ago till today
We request for your prompt response 
Kindly get back to us now
TNT Express Worldwide

subject: Re:   TNT Express Worldwide
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this message has caught me by surprise. I am indeed alive and well, and I have not been in contact with anyone named Mrs. Lucia Sausa or provided any new address.

Could you please provide more information about this ATM card? I'm curious to know how it is related to me and why it was sent to the address mentioned in your message.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Francis
